quotes.message: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.name: Gen George Patton

quotes.message: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating the problem in a way that will allow a solution.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Time on its back bears all things far away - Full many a challenge is wrought by many a day - Shape, fortune, name, and nature all decay.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Reality challenges and rewards. I believe our best days are yet to come.
quotes.name: George W Bush

quotes.message: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Don't be a cynic and disconsolate preacher. Don't bewail and moan. Omit the negative propositions. Challenge us with incessant affirmatives.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Leadership is the challenge to be something more than average.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: These are times in which a genius would wish to live. It is not in the still calm of life, or in the repose of a pacific station, that great challenges are formed. . . . Great necessities call out great virtues.
quotes.name: Unknown
